thread.title: World Indigenous Games get off to colorful, if rocky, start
thread.title_full: World Indigenous Games get off to colorful, if rocky, start

title: World Indigenous Games get off to colorful, if rocky, start
text: > International World Indigenous Games get off to colorful, if rocky, start Xerente women celebrate a goal against the Pataxo Brazilian tribe team in a soccer match during the World Indigenous Games, in Palmas, Brazil, Friday, Oct. 23, 2015. The World Indigenous Games officially opens Friday, when Brazilian President Dilma Rousseff is expected to attend a lavish opening ceremony in the games' host city, Palmas, a remote outpost in the sunbaked heart of Brazil. Billed as the first "indigenous Olympics", the games are expected to attract nearly 2,000 athletes from dozens of Brazilian native tribes, as well as from such far-flung nations as Ethiopia and New Zealand. (AP Photo/Eraldo Peres)
